sheep.input
Class Keyboard

java.lang.Object
  sheep.input.Keyboard
All Implemented Interfaces:
android.view.View.OnKeyListener
public class Keyboard
extends java.lang.Object
implements android.view.View.OnKeyListener

This singleton class tracks the state of the keyboard. The key input callbacks in Android are good, but games are primarily concerned with the current state of certain keys.

Author:
Anders Ruud

isDown

public boolean isDown(int key)
Checks whether a key is down.

Parameters:
key - The virtual key code from KeyEvent.
Returns:
True if down, false if up and false if unknown key.
